Iron Mind.name: Iron Mind
Iron Mind.flavor: Under the brunt of an attack, you use the power of your mind to fortify yourself against harm.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack.

Effect: You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
